title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state. The view should stay maximized even after switching perspectives.
OB: The CVS repository view is no longer maximized after switching perspectives.
EB: The CVS repository view should stay maximized after switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.
2. Double click the title bar to maximize it.
3. Switch to the resource perspective.
4. Switch back to the Java perspective.
